```{r}
if(!require(parallel)) {
  install.packages("parallel")
}
library(parallel)
library(diceR)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
library(cluster)
library(Rtsne)
library(data.table)
library(reticulate)
use_python("/usr/local/bin/python")
source_python("clustering_func.py")

pyclustering<-import('pyclustering')
np<-import('numpy')
pd<-import('pandas')

colon_data_df<-pd$read_table("../dataFile/201126/Colon_merged_273samples.txt")
colon_data<-fread("../dataFile/201126/Colon_merged_273samples.txt")
```

```{r}
colon_data<-colon_data[, -12980]
lable<-colon_data[, 12979]
colon_data<-colon_data[, -12979]
row_name<-unlist(colon_data[,1])

```

```{r}
obj<-dice(colon_data,nk=19,reps=10, algorithms = c("hc","km","diana"), cons.funs = c("majority","CSPA","LCE"), progress = TRUE , evaluate = F, prep.data = "full")
```


```{r}
cons_result<-as.data.frame(obj[["clusters"]],row.names = row_name)
c_data_df<-as.data.frame(colon_data, row.names=row_name)
```

```{r}
autoplot(prcomp(c_data_df, center = T, scale. = T), 
         data = c_data_df, colour =as.factor(cons_result$majority), size = 3, label = F,

    theme_bw() + 
    theme(legend.direction = 'horizontal', legend.position = 'top')
```

```{r}

birch_cluster<-BIRCH_func(colon_data, as.integer(19))

assign("CURE", cure_func, 1)
assign("BIRCH", BIRCH_func, 1)

CURE<-function(df, k){
  cure_cluster<-cure_func(df,as.integer(k))
  for(i in 1:k){
    for(j in 1:length(cure_cluster[[i]])){
      arr[(cure_cluster[[i]][j]+1)]<-i
    }
  }
  arr<-as.integer(arr)
  return(arr)
}

cure_cluster<-cure_func(colon_data, as.integer(19))

cure_data<-CURE(colon_data,19)

```

```{r}
km <- function(x, k) {
  as.integer(stats::kmeans(x, k)$cluster)
}

km_data<-km(colon_data, 19)
km_data

cc <- consensus_cluster(colon_data, nk=19, reps = 10, algorithms = c("CURE","BIRCH"), distance = c("euclidean"), progress = T)
```
